name: Stranded: Midnight Oil
description:
Sometimes cars can break down in bad circumstances - but this is worse... This is life and death, and to avoid the latter, you must be quick, for your kind isn't welcome around here... In this short horror game, you only have one choice: Escape or Perish, for time is not your friend...

Dev Background info (Please Read)

This Game had to be created from scratch as part of a 96 hour game jam competition, but may receive some small updates in the future, it was created by Redfin (Developer and Designer) and K. Simpson (Artist and Music Composer).

GAME CONTROLS

W,A,S,D = Move

P = Pause Game

Number keys 2-6 = Select current item

E/Left Mouse Click = Apply/Equip item
